name: Negative Days
description:
Negative Days

Shovel snow and connect with the neighbors. Who knows what's buried here?

Featuring a little procgen forest, a daily weather cycle, an advanced shovelgorithm, as well as skiing, skating, and sleuthing.

Controls
  • WASD - move around
  • E - interact with world
  • SPACE - use item
  • SHIFT - wear item
  • Q - open inventory
  • M - open map
  • N - open newspaper
Credits
  • Unity
  • Inkle
  • Newtonsoft JSON
  • Jille Jr's JSON For Unity Converters
  • Kenney's RPG and Impact sounds
  • Celesti's Ice Magic SFX
  • Sound Works 12's Weather Wind Winter sounds
  • Owlstorm, Nicoproson, and InspectorJ on Freesound
  • Averia Serif, Unica One, and Grenze Gotisch from Google Fonts
Soundtrack jpojecp · Negative Days

Throughout all of Simultanea, the clock ticked…
